category: National Team Athletes’ Village Operation Regulations/Article 12 (Facilities)
contents: Article 12 (Facilities) Athletes’ village facilities are classified as follows, and details regarding operation are determined separately. 1. Training facilities are facilities operated for tactical and physical training of residents, and include training centers, weight training centers, and cross-country courses for each event. 2. Support facilities are facilities provided for the athletes’ village life and include athlete lodging (Hwarang Hall), athletes’ cafeteria, administrative center, welcome center, champion house, etc. 3. A medical center is a medical facility operated to treat or provide emergency measures for injuries and illnesses of residents. Revised 2020. 10. 23.
